A Means of Education.--I have had special light in regard to the canvassing work, and the impression and burden does not leave me. This work is a means of 
                                                                           32
education. It is an excellent school for those who are qualifying themselves to enter the ministry. Those who take up this work as they should place themselves where they learn of Christ and follow His example. Angels are commissioned to go forth with those who take up this work in true humility.--Manuscript 26, 1901.
